input.sentences: the university students were having a farewell lunch .
they discussed with each other what their plans were for after graduation .
they were all smiles as they thought about what their future was going to be .
they had an idea to take a photo together to retain the memories that they had in class together .
they all smiled and posed for the photo during their last time as a group .
output.sentences: Today the students at the university enjoyed a special lunch.
They discussed their plans for graduation.
There were so many smiles as they spoke of their bright future.
They didn't want to forget their youth and all agreed to retain a photo of this day to refresh their memories later in life.
So they all gathered around, smiled and posed for the camera to keep this moment frozen in time.
